Description: Ostracon, fragment (now joined to 57466) of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the fabric contains a number of white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and very faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393404) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393404)
